## IPlot interface

Basic drawing unit to which entities and behaviors can be attached.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPlot<TPlotRange extends IPlotRange, TRequiredTraits> extends IReadonlyPlot<TPlotRange, TRequiredTraits>, IWritablePlot<TRequiredTraits>, TOnCanvasResized 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [IReadonlyPlot](./core.ireadonlyplot.md)<!-- -->&lt;TPlotRange, TRequiredTraits&gt;, [IWritablePlot](./core.iwritableplot.md)<!-- -->&lt;TRequiredTraits&gt;, [TOnCanvasResized](./core.toncanvasresized.md)
